lines.text:
[sarcastically to Kirk when he comes back with Elmer, not the baby]
You couldn't catch a cold i a barrel of ice water, Kirk!

[to Alibi]
Elmer's sure got your number, Alibi.

[to Elmer]
We're gettin' pretty fed up with that jabberin'!

[to Alibi]
Why don't you put that dummy away?
Whose that dummy, you big ape? Get down off that horse and I'll tear yuh apart... if I ketch yuh.
This is the sheriff, and he's tryin' to track down some bad men.

[sarcastically]
Bet he couldm't track an elephant in three feet of snow.
